title: Open bookmarks in a new tab option "on the right to the current tab"
content:
Hi,

regarding this problem/solution: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1207970 Additionally or instead of the flag there should be a "mode" setting defining how to open the new tab e.g. "on the right to the current tab" etc.

Best regards, Alex
creator: eimsbush

title: Prevent Master Password Popup
content:
I realize, this is an old issue and has been around for years, but please for the love of god, make the master password popup less frustrating. Every single site with a login field triggers the popup. It really needs a setting, where you can browse the web and it never shows a popup, unless you click a button to actually login (could be next to the URL field)

Is there any known workaround, apart from always logging in?
creator: FFIsABrowser

title: Firefox will not play some video and the internet says it is a problem with "JW PLAYER".
content:
This was not always true as now I can no longer play some videos that I could play some time back. Both Firefox and Edge they say have the same problem. It started, I think in 2019 or 2021.

The error message is: This video file cannot be played. (Error Code: 232011) 1. Is there a "fix"? 2. Is there a "work around"? 3. Will MOZILLA ever address this problem?

[Ignore image as it was supposed to be the error message but it will not allow me to remove]
creator: jagman55

title: Firefox closes suddenly
content:
Several times in the last week or so, the browser has just suddenly closed. I do not get any crash message. When I reopen Firefox, my tabs are restored (not sure if this has been true every time).

Firefox automatically updated to 97.0.1 on 2/17/22. I don't think the problem occurred before then.
creator: nonpsvdl

title: How can I transfer bookmarks from a pc to an iMac
content: How can I transfer bookmarks from a pc to an iMac? You should have a button to click on that prompts you to put in a thumb drive and it automatically copies bookmarks and you just have to transfer it to the other computer. And why can't you customize bookmarks with different colors and fonts? It would make it easier to find what you're looking for.
creator: garmasters

results in: .NET Framework 4.5.2 or a later update is already installed on this computer.

searching Firefox Browser ADD-ONS yields: 0 results found for "Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2"

title: The screen moves when I type.
content: When I go to type something into a box in Facebook (I think it's only Facebook, it's not happening here) the screen keeps jumping so the text box moves to the very bottom of the screen.
